response.overview: In the face of climate crisis, Hope in the Anthropocene follows passionate environmentalists in British Columbia as they confront fear, burnout, and the weight of an uncertain future â€” yet still choose hope. Through deeply personal stories, this film explores what it means to keep fighting for the planet when despair feels inevitable, and how resilience can grow even in fragile times.  Documentary from Canada Directed by Elis Fowler & Shaia Brites
response.title: Hope in the Anthropocene
